document_data.caption: An image of the red dragon Caminus.
document_data.name: Caminus
document_data.mainbody: '''Caminus''' was a [[red dragon]] in [[Damara]] who was slain in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He laird in the lava-filled crater of a volcano.
document_data.History:
Caminus took part in the [[orc]] attack on the [[Gemspark Mine]] in Damara ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1373}}. He obeyed the order of the [[Slaad lord]] [[Ygorl]], and served as his mount in an attack on [[Khelben Arunsun]]'s tower.

[[File:Demon Stone concept Caminus.jpg|thumb|300px|''[[Rannek]] fighting Caminus.'']]
Caminus killed the [[githyanki]] general [[Cireka]] after Ygorl hurled her through a [[portal]] to the [[Caminus's lair|dragon's lair]]. Caminus was in turn was killed by [[Rannek]], [[Zhai]] and [[Illius]], who had come to his lair in pursuit of Cireka.
